{"id":559919438,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1632429594,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"216 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/559919438/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"14.7 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    \n    def get_prefix_sum(self,nums):\n        prefix_sum = [0 for i in range(len(nums))]\n        prefix_sum[0] = nums[0]\n        for i in range(1,len(nums)):\n            prefix_sum[i] = prefix_sum[i-1]+nums[i]\n        return prefix_sum\n        \n    def pivotIndex(self, nums):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type nums: List[int]\n        :rtype: int\n        \"\"\"\n        prefix_sum = self.get_prefix_sum(nums)\n        print(prefix_sum)\n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            l_sum = prefix_sum[i]-nums[i]\n            r_sum = prefix_sum[-1]-prefix_sum[i]\n            print(\"for index {}, l_sum{}, r_sum{}\".format(i,l_sum,r_sum))\n            if(l_sum==r_sum):\n                return i\n        return -1\n        \n   ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
